data.author: Jiang Nan

changelog.release_notes: Add append function to expend the length limit of text from 2k to 10k.

This is a spy note app design for who want to save secret note in your watch and view it silently.
You can set any note you want in the setting page including all utf-8 character.

Usage:
After you installed the app, its name will become 'best alarm'(pretend to be another app). You need to put the note in setting page. 
When you open the app, it shows 'no alarm available', that means it is working. Rotate the watch screen down to show your note. Use acceleration to scroll. And rotate another time to return to fake alarm screen.

Warning: it is just a app for secret note. Not responsible for any kind of activity like cheating!

data.description:
This is a spy note app design for who want to save secret note in your watch and view it silently.
You can set any note you want in the setting page including all utf-8 character.

Usage:
After you installed the app, its name will become 'best alarm'(pretend to be another app). You need to put the note in setting page. 
When you open the app, it shows 'no alarm available', that means it is working. Rotate the watch screen down to show your note. Use acceleration to scroll. And rotate another time to return to fake alarm screen.   

You can only input 4k once in setting page, you can input new text to append, max length of content would be 20k   
  
Warning: it is just a app for secret note. Not responsible for any kind of activity like cheating!

latest_release.release_notes: Add append function to expend the length limit of text from 2k to 10k.

data.title: Spy Note
